snippet.title: Gintama Rumble Trailer #1 (English)
snippet.description:
The first game trailer for Gintama Rumble!
A chronicle of Gintama stories, follow Gintoki and his odd job members, Shinpachi and Kagura on their epic adventure.

Also announcing day-1 bonus - chosen by popular vote!

Gintama Rumble (with Japanese voice over and English subtitles) will be available both physically and digitally for the PlayStation®4 computer entertainment system  in Southeast Asia (Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia and Philippines).

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment Southeast Asia:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bandainamcoe...
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoSEA
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcosea
